content: > the written instructions for this blanket are available for ** free on my blog 1 ** the downloadable pdf listed here for sale contains written instructions and chart **facebook group** i have a facebook group where i provide support for all my patterns - join the group 2 **about the pattern** this blanket is an easy make since it has a simple and repetitive pattern and is made with only two stitches it has a reverse stitch border so there is no curling and all you need is one skein of the lion brand pound of love yarn the finished blanket is soft and cozy and is perfect to cover yourself up with on the couch with a good book or movie to enjoy this blanket is part of a 5 blanket series i designed using the same technique all the blankets in this series are available for purchase as a collection at a 20% discount **skill level** easy - the pattern expects basic knowledge of starting and ending a tunisian crochet project and how to make tunisian knit 3 and reverse 4 stitches **what the pattern contains** 1 written pattern 2 chart **sharing on social media** if you decide to share your projects on social media i would love to see them please tag your posts with ** @knitterknotter 5 #knitterknotter 6 #madewithknitterknotter 7 ** **blog** you can find all my patterns on my blog here https //knitterknotter com/patterns/ please do not copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell finished items but please credit the pattern to me arunima goel @ knitterknotter i will be happy to see your finished product s join my facebook group to share pictures of your work and to get any help you might need https //www facebook com/groups/knitterknotterhangout/ you can follow me on my blog to get updates on new patterns https //knitterknotter com **discounts** you can always find the following discounts in my shop buy 2 patterns and get 10% off add 2 patterns to your cart buy 3 patterns and get 15% off add 3 patterns to your cart buy 4 patterns and get 1 pattern of value up to $5 free add 5 patterns to your cart and the one with the lowest price will be free > this is a pattern only and not a completed item 1 https //knitterknotter com/easy-tunisian-crochet-blanket-free-pattern/ 2 https //www facebook com/groups/knitterknotterhangout/ 3 https //knitterknotter com/tunisian-crochet-tutorial-tunisian-knit-stitch/ 4 https //knitterknotter com/tunisian-crochet-tutorial-reverse-stitch-trs/ 5 https //www instagram com/knitterknotter/ 6 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/knitterknotter/ 7 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/madewithknitterknotter/
